resources.string: You don\'t have any shortcuts yet.
A shortcut allows you to send a single HTTP request, optionally processing and displaying the response.\n\nClick the + button to get started, or check the Documentation in the About section.
You haven\'t added any shortcuts to trigger yet.
Add all the shortcuts to this list that you want to trigger as part of this multi-shortcut.\n\nClick the + button to get started.
You don\'t have any variables yet.

Variables allow you to dynamically insert values into your shortcuts, e.g., into the URL, headers or request body. Look for the \"{}\" button when editing a shortcut to find all the places where a variable placeholder can be inserted.\n\nClick the + button to add a variable.
You have unsaved changes. Discard changes?
Shortcut not found. You might have to re-add it to the home screen.
Response too large to display (limit is %s)
Failed to use image as icon.
Enable if shortcuts are not working when triggered from Quick Settings Tile or 3rd party app
Allow Displaying Pop-Up Windows While in Background
Enable if shortcuts are not working when triggered from Home Screen
Send crash reports to help improve the app
The selected file was exported by a newer version of the app. Please make sure you have the latest version of the app installed.
Using certificate file. Click to remove.
A copy of the file and password will be stored inside the app without special protection. Use at your own risk.
That\'s right, this app is open-source
Show your appreciation by buying me a drink
%1$s will execute once a connection to the internet is available.
Thank you for your ratings and reviews
Accept any certificate (I know what I\'m doing)
Delete this category?\n\nAll shortcuts contained within will be deleted.
Stores a constant value. The value can be changed programmatically via the \'Scripting\' feature
Shows a dialog with a text input field
Shows a dialog with a number input field
Shows a dialog with a number slider with a set minimum and maximum value
Shows a dialog with a password input field
Shows a selection dialog to pick one or multiple values
Switches to a different value every time when used
Generates a new random UUID on each execution
Assumes the value that was last copied to the clipboard
Shows a dialog with a date picker
Shows a dialog with a time picker
Shows a dialog with a color picker
Variable names may only contain underscores, digits and letters from the English alphabet.
Variable name must not be empty.
Another variable with this name already exists.

This button allows you to include placeholders for variables, i.e., dynamic values, into your shortcut.\n\nYou don\'t have any variables configured yet. You can do so by clicking the CREATE button below.
This button allows you to include placeholders for the values of other variables into this one.\n\nYou don\'t have any variables configured yet, however.
You don\'t have any variables yet. Click the CREATE button below to get started.
You don\'t have any static variables yet that can be set by this action. Click the CREATE button below to get started.
Please add at least two values.
Please add at least one selectable option.
The date format is not valid.
The time format is not valid.

No suitable shortcuts found.

To use this feature you need to have at least one shortcut that uses a variable that allows receiving the shared text as its value, or a shortcut that has a file parameter or uses a file as its request body.

Click the help button in the variable section for more information.
Allow Receiving Value from Share Dialog
Enabling this allows you to share text from other apps and use that shared text as the temporary value for this variable.
Enable this if you are using this variable inside a JSON string, e.g., in a request body. Special characters will be escaped.
Enable this if you are using this variable inside a URL, e.g., as part of a query string. Special characters will be escaped.
Open the URL in the browser
Write JavaScript code for advanced workflows
Type or paste a cURL command below to create a new shortcut from it.
Show as app shortcut on launcher
Allow triggering via Quick Settings Tile
This feature is not supported on your device.
Browser with package name "%s" not found
Prevent changes to shortcuts and settings
Add a tile to quickly trigger shortcuts from the notification shade
Change the title of the app\'s main screen
The maximum must be greater than the minimum.
The step size must be a positive number.
Define how to handle the response
Run JavaScript code before or after execution
Define when and how the shortcut should be executed
For people who know what they\'re doing
Requires the \'QR Droid\', \'Barcode Scanner\' or \'Binary Eye\' app to be installed
Schedule another shortcut to run after the current one finishes
Execute another shortcut immediately and return its result
Queries the device\'s physical location and returns it as an object
Maximum recursion depth reached. Shortcut will not be triggered.

Select the method to use for placing the shortcut. If you encounter problems with the \"Default\" method you may try the \"Legacy\" method instead. Please note that some features (e.g. changing shortcut name) are not available with the Legacy method.
Enter your password to unlock the app settings.
Enter a password to lock the app settings and prevent modification of your shortcuts.
Data Saver and/or Battery Saver modes are enabled on your device. If you encounter problems with shortcuts not working, please try disabling these.
Set the shortcut\'s URL and HTTP method
Basic authentication with username and password
Digest authentication with username and password
Click the + button to add a request header.
Click the + button to add a parameter.
Variable error: tried to get value of variable that doesn\'t exist: %s
Variable error: tried to set value of variable that doesn\'t exist: %s
Get Size of Selected File (in Bytes)
Could not trigger shortcut \"%1$s\" because it does not exist.
Could not rename shortcut \"%1$s\" because it does not exist.
Could not change icon of shortcut \"%1$s\" because it does not exist.
Could not change description of shortcut \"%1$s\" because it does not exist.
Unsupported HMAC algorithm \"%1$s\" or invalid key. Use %2$s.
The \'QR Droid\', \'Barcode Scanner\' or \'Binary Eye\' app needs to be installed to scan barcodes.
Can only import from valid http(s) URL
You do not yet have any shortcuts that can be triggered via the Quick Settings tile.\n\nYou can enable this feature by editing a shortcut and selecting the checkbox \"%1$s\" found in \"%2$s\".
Text exceeds character limit of %d. Cannot insert variable placeholder.
Select or create a shortcut to place it on the home screen.

plurals.name: warning_variable_still_in_use_in_shortcuts
plurals.item: This variable is still in use in %2$d shortcut: %1$s
This variable is still in use in %2$d shortcuts: %1$s

resources.string: Add JavaScript code here to run before the shortcut is executed, e.g., to prepare some variables.
Add JavaScript code here to run after the shortcut is executed, e.g., to process the response.
Add JavaScript code here to run in case the request fails.
There are no shortcuts that can be added. You need to create some additional shortcuts first before you can select them here.
Remove shortcut \"%s\" from the list of triggered shortcuts?
Remove deleted shortcut from the list of triggered shortcuts?
This feature allows you to edit your shortcuts on a computer, from the comfort of a browser. Please read the app\'s Privacy Policy before getting started, then follow these steps:
Enter a password into the field above.
Open %s in a browser on your computer, enter your device ID and password and start editing.
"Once you are done editing and have saved your changes click the \"Pull Changes\" button below to download your changes back into the app."
Failed to push to server. Please try again later.
Failed to pull changes from server. Please check your network connection and make sure you did not change the password.
Run JavaScript code before every shortcut execution
Add JavaScript code here to run at the start of every shortcut execution, e.g., to prepare some variables or define some functions which can be used in a shortcut\'s Scripting section.
To use the deep-linking feature, make sure to use a valid URL of the form:\n\n%s
Location permissions are required to check the name (SSID) of the current Wi-Fi network. This is a requirement imposed by the Android OS. Your location data is not accessed directly.
Not connected to the Wi-Fi network configured for this shortcut \"%1$s\". Select another Wi-Fi network now?
Failed to determine the current Wi-Fi\'s SSID. Location permission is required.
Enable to export shortcuts & variables using the old file format (i.e., a single JSON file). This will prevent the exporting of custom shortcut icons.
Failed to load or use the client certificate. It may be that this is not supported by your device or that it needs to be re-configured in the shortcut\'s settings.
You can trigger this shortcut by invoking this URL from another app, e.g., via a QR scanner or NFC reader. Append query parameters to the URL to pass variable values.
If you need more advanced options for processing and displaying the response, check out the \'%s\' section, which lets you define custom logic using JavaScript code.
Toasts are best suited for very short messages, as they are limited to only 2 lines of text.
Converts a Uint8Array into a string of hexadecimal digits
Converts a Uint8Array into a string
Converts a Base64 encoded string into a Unit8Array (byte array)
Converts a string or Uint8Array (byte array) into a Base64 encoded string
No app was found that can open the URL %s.
No app was found was found with package name %s.
Failed to determine the SSID of the current Wi-Fi.
The device\'s physical location could not be determined.
Play Services are required to get the device\'s location, but they are not installed or not available.
Enter the raw HTTP request body here. You can add variable placeholders via the \"{}\" button.
This icon is still being used in at least 1 shortcut. Deleting it might cause problems.\n\nDelete anyway?
Failed to fetch icon. This website might not have a suitable one.
Remove leading and trailing whitespace characters
Choose the color of your shortcut\'s label, or whether to hide the label completely.
Unsaved changes on shortcut \"%s\" were found. Would you like to recover the changes and continue editing?
Unsaved changes on a shortcut were found. Would you like to recover the changes and continue editing?
Help me make this app better by translating it into your language!
URLs with file:// scheme are not supported
Opening files using openUrl() is not supported

You will see details about recently triggered shortcuts here, which you can use for troubleshooting.\nYou can exclude individual shortcuts from appearing here via an option found on the \"%s\" screen.
